title: M.S. Student, National Taiwan University
description: Chun-Hao received his B.S. degree in the Department of Bioenvironmental System Engineering at Nationalal Taiwan University. He joined MarCE Lab in 2021. His research interests are artificial intelligence, semantic segmentation and reinforcement learning.

title: M.S. Student, National Taiwan University
description: Ting-Yan received his B.S. degrees in the Department of Civil Engineering at Nationalal Taiwan University. He joined MarCE Lab in 2022. His recent research focuses on deep learning, computer vision and generative models.

title: M.S. Student, National Taiwan University
description: Hai-Wei received his B.S. degrees in the Department of Civil Engineering at Nationalal Taiwan University in 2022. His research interests are computer vision, image coordinate transformation, and object detection, especially the detection of objects with varying sizes.

title: M.S. Student, National Taiwan University
description: Yang-Sheng received his B.S. degree in the Department of Civil Engineering at Nationalal Taiwan University Of Science and Technology in 2022. His research interest is seismic metamaterial design.

title: M.S. Student, National Taiwan University
description: Yu-Wei received his B.S. degree in the Department of Civil Engineering at Nationalal Cheng Kung University in 2022. His research interest is Digital Twin in the vision of Smart Cities.

title: M.S. Student, National Taiwan University
description: Hong-Bo received his B.S. degrees in the Department of Civil Engineering at Chung Yuan Christian University in 2022. He is pursuing his M.S. degree at Nationalal Taiwan University. His current research focuses on the developments of Unmanned Aerial Vehicles (UAVs) based approaches for disaster prevention and rescuing.

title: M.S. Student, National Taiwan University
description: Jia-Wen received his B.S. degree in the Department of Civil Engineering at Nationalal Taiwan University in 2022 and is currently pursuing his M.S. degree. His current research interests are structural health monitoring and artificial intelligence.

title: M.S. Student, National Taiwan University
description: Hui-Yin joined MarCE Lab in 2021. Her research interest is deep learning with a focus on image segmentation of surface cracks.

title: M.S. Student, National Taiwan University
description: Chao-Sheng received his B.S. degrees in the Department of Civil Engineering at Nationalal Taiwan University in 2023. His research interests are artificial intelligence and digital twin.

title: M.S. Student, National Taiwan University
description: Che-Ming is pursuing his M.S. degree in the Department of Civil Engineering at Nationalal Taiwan University. His research interests are structural engineering, digital twin and computer vision.
